body: If only he didn't kidnapped him maybe they would be a happy couple who knows....

Truth be told who in their right mind forgives people like that perverted ass...I loved it, but god I wish the guy that looked like Eren could of either killed him in the end or hated his guts and planned to kill him if he ever saw him again. Like come on! Hate that B*tch!! Don't fall for that prick!
Kinda looked like eren. But story is pretty good.
